case.title: younger looking for older - 19 (london)
case.text:
19 year old girl looking for an older man, as a type of mentor in some respects obviously with other mutual perks too.
I have always been attracted to older men, but have struggled to find somebody
I would prefer a caucasian male, of any age :)
Get in touch, 1 liners will not be responded too, please tell me more about yourself.
Genuine ad.
